belongs_to_collection.name: 真・事故物件 シリーズ

original_title: 真・事故物件／本当に怖い住民たち
overview: Set in an apartment where a YouTuber and an idol are forced to participate in a program called "I can't go home until I live in the accident property and capture the ghost in the camera". Gore and splatter ensues.
title: True Accident Property / Really Scary Residents
